meta.title: Panelyt - Blood Test Optimizer
meta.description: Optimize blood test panel costs using current prices and 30-day minimums.
meta.templateDetailDescription: View biomarkers and pricing for the {name} template.
meta.accountDescription: Connect Telegram to receive price drop notifications.
meta.sharedListDescription: View biomarkers and live pricing for the shared list {name}.

auth.usernameHint: 3-64 characters: lowercase letters, digits, hyphen, underscore.
auth.signInDescription: Enter your credentials to sync saved lists and notifications.
auth.registerDescription: Pick a username and password to secure your selections and future alerts.

home.searchTip: Tip: press <key>Enter</key> to add the top match instantly.
home.noMatches: No direct matches yet. Try typing the biomarker name.
home.pasteDescription: Add multiple biomarkers at once by pasting comma- or newline-separated codes.
home.pasteEmpty: Paste at least one biomarker code.
home.pasteAdded: Added {count, plural, one {# biomarker} other {# biomarkers}}.
home.emptyBiomarkers: Add biomarkers to compare prices across single tests and bundles. We'll highlight packages that introduce bonus coverage along the way.
home.clearAllDescription: This will remove every biomarker from your panel.

selection.alreadySelected: All biomarkers from {name} are already selected.
selection.addedFrom: Added {count, plural, one {# biomarker} other {# biomarkers}} from {name}.

results.emptyState: Start by adding biomarkers above. Panelyt will run the solver instantly and suggest the cheapest combination of single tests and packages, highlighting any bonus biomarkers you pick up along the way.

lists.title: My Lists
lists.description: Manage every saved biomarker set, load it into the optimizer, or clean up old entries.
lists.noLists: No lists yet. Build a selection on the home page and press <saveButton>Save</saveButton> to store it here.
lists.shareDescription: Generate a shareable link to let others view this list without editing rights.
lists.deleteDescription: This will permanently remove the list and its saved biomarkers.
lists.linkTelegramFirst: Link your Telegram chat in <link>Account settings</link> before enabling alerts.

saveList.title: Save current selection
saveList.description: Give this set a name so you can reload it or compare prices later.

collections.title: Curated Templates
collections.description: Start with science-backed biomarker bundles. Load a template into the optimizer or inspect the details before running price comparisons.
collections.failedToLoad: Failed to load templates. Please try again.
collections.noTemplates: No templates published yet. Check back soon!

templateDetail.notFound: We couldn't find that biomarker list. It may have been unpublished.
templateDetail.pricingDescription: The optimizer runs automatically against diag.pl prices. Adjust the template in the main app to explore alternatives.

optimization.noPackagesSelected: No packages selected in the optimal basket.
optimization.noSinglesSelected: No single tests selected in the optimal basket.
optimization.coverageGapsSummary: {count, plural, one {# biomarker cannot be covered by this lab} other {# biomarkers cannot be covered by this lab}}
optimization.biomarkersForPrice: {count, plural, one {# biomarker} other {# biomarkers}} for +{price}
optimization.addsBiomarkers: Adds {count, plural, one {# biomarker} other {# biomarkers}}
optimization.extraBiomarkersIncluded: {count, plural, one {# extra biomarker} other {# extra biomarkers}} included
optimization.optimizationSummaryDescription: Covering {count, plural, one {# biomarker} other {# biomarkers}} with the most cost-efficient mix available right now. Compare current pricing against the recent 30-day floor to understand potential savings.
optimization.bonusBiomarkersSummary: {count, plural, one {# bonus biomarker} other {# bonus biomarkers}} ({total})
optimization.packageOverlapsCollapsed: Click to see biomarkers in multiple packages

sharedList.notFound: Unable to find this shared list.
sharedList.invalidLink: This share link is no longer valid or has been revoked by its owner.
sharedList.livePricingDescription: Panelyt computes the cheapest basket for this shared list using the latest diag.pl prices.

account.title: Account Settings
account.description: Link your Telegram chat to receive alerts when any saved list gets cheaper.
account.signInRequired: Sign in to manage Telegram alerts and saved lists.
account.telegramUnavailable: Telegram integration is currently unavailable. Try again later.
account.telegramDescription: Start the bot in Telegram, then either tap the deep-link button or send the command shown below. You can also paste the chat ID manually if the bot replies with it.
account.sendCommand: Send <command></command> to the bot or tap below.
account.generateTokenHint: Generate a token to link a new chat or refresh the connection.
account.pasteChatId: Paste chat ID to link manually
account.step1: Tap the bot link or search for your Panelyt bot in Telegram and press <start>Start</start>.
account.step2: The bot replies with your chat ID and the <link>/link</link> command.
account.step3: Either use the command or paste the chat ID above to connect your account.
account.step4: Enable alerts on any saved list from the Lists page. We will ping you when the price drops.

templateModal.modalDescription: Templates appear on the public collections page. Provide a clear slug and description so others understand the intent.

errors.failedToLoad: Failed to load. Please try again.
errors.clipboardUnavailable: Clipboard is unavailable. Copy the token manually.
errors.failedToCalculateTotals: Failed to calculate totals for saved lists.
errors.listNeedsBiomarkers: Add biomarkers before saving a list.
errors.templateNeedsBiomarkers: Add biomarkers before saving a template.

seo.homeOgDescription: Find the cheapest blood test combination. Compare prices across labs and save money.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Panelyt is an open-source tool that helps you find the cheapest blood test combinations. We respect your privacy and collect only what's necessary to provide the service.
privacy.analyticsText: We use Umami, a privacy-focused analytics tool. Umami does not use cookies, does not collect personal data, and does not track you across websites. We only see aggregated, anonymous statistics like page views and country of origin.
privacy.accountDataText: If you create an account, we store your username and a securely hashed password. We never store your password in plain text.
privacy.savedListsText: Your saved biomarker lists are stored on our servers so you can access them from any device. You can delete your lists at any time.
privacy.telegramText: If you link your Telegram account, we store your chat ID to send you price drop notifications. You can disconnect at any time from your account settings.
privacy.dataRetentionText: We retain your data for as long as your account is active. If you delete your account, all associated data is permanently removed.
privacy.thirdPartiesText: We do not sell, trade, or share your personal data with third parties. Price data is fetched from diag.pl's public catalog.
privacy.contactText: Questions about this policy? Email us at <email>contact@panelyt.com</email>.
privacy.yourRightsText: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. Contact us to exercise these rights.
